entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:05 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:05 PM ADT Saturday 8 April 2023
